name: Pixel Car Racing
description:
---  Pixel Car Racing ---

Choose from 10 car bodies and apply custom paint on it. Drive towards the sunset with your dream car on an unlimited map.

--- Controls ---

 W/S: Accelerate/Decelerate
A/D: Rotate car in mid-air
F5: Restart game
ESC: Return to menu

--- Team ---

Umut Gürdal:
Game Designer
Game Developer
Pixel Artist
Foley Artist
